title: Chapter 1473 - Offering My Flesh To Usher In My Buddha
volume_title: His Sword Takes Aim A The Three Thousand Worlds Of The Stars, Suppressing Foes Both Past And Present
body:
Chapter 1473 - Offering My Flesh To Usher In My Buddha

The young man’s pleas echoed throughout the stars, astonishing everyone present.

Uncle?

That handsome young man was already so strong. What kind of terrifying existence was his uncle?

The five divine emissaries were instantly solemn. All of them looked at Su Yi.

What they saw left them baffled. The young man in blue showed no trace of a cultivation base. He seemed no different from an ordinary mortal.

But that only made him seem even stranger!

“Be careful!” the red-robed man transmitted a warning to the other four divine emissaries.

As they conversed, they surrounded and attacked the handsome young man with all their might, never once stopping to rest.

“Master, why…. Why is he suddenly calling you his uncle…?” Qing Tang was stunned too. Her beautiful eyes widened. She couldn’t help but find this absurd. She’d never heard of her master having such a terrifyingly strong nephew.

It wasn’t just her, either. Su Yi was completely caught off guard too. Uncle? What uncle? I have no idea who that guy even is!

No, wait…. Is he one of my past lives’ nephews!? Su Yi’s brow furrowed.

“Uncle, quickly! I was ordered here to help alleviate your concerns and...
original_title: Chapter 1473 - Offering My Flesh to Usher in My Buddha
